name: Top Angler
synopsis: The latest, cutting-edge fishing game from the developers of Sega Bass Fishing for the Dreamcast puts you right out in the water.  A robust graphics engine featuring state-of-the-art visuals uses the power of the Playstation 2 to its fullest.  Accurate and detailed fish models bring Largemouth Bass, Redeye, Bluegills and more to life.  Compete in a challenging Campaign mode, or test your skills in the Arcade mode.  See if you can become the Top Angler!
